person.persName: Marion Botts (Montgomery County, Kentucky, saddler and harness maker.)

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, saddler and harness maker. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Botts and Virginia Christopher Botts. Attended school in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned thirteen enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1850. Household owned at least two enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1852. Household owned at least six enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1859. Saddler in Montgomery County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1860. Household owned an additional nineteen enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1860. Harness maker in Montgomery County in 1863.
